channel.title: Connecting Problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, I never had any problem with my server till this point.
I added a candy cane custom item, compiled and hit reset server.
I went to log in, it says: Error connecting to server.
Next I deleted the client totally and re extracted the orginal...still nothing...
Please Help me...
Owner of Elitescape,
Will

item.title: Connecting Problem
item.dc:creator: @Reilly Reilly
item.description:
@Reilly wrote:

ChaosPkers:

[quote author=aquikzebra link=topic=440494.msg3236825#msg3236825 date=1276546546] I don’t think this is the problem, but my internet connection is a bit laggy so could that be the problem? -Owner Will [/quote]This may seem stupid, but check your no-ip. What happends to me is, whenever I make any changes with my internet in general, my IP address changes itself. So you may want to update your no-ip with your new ip address if you need to

Yes, That happend to me when i ran my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting Problem
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:3, topic:344115”]I don’t think this is the problem, but my internet connection is a bit laggy so could that be the problem?

-Owner Will[/quote]This may seem stupid, but check your no-ip. What happends to me is, whenever I make any changes with my internet in general, my IP address changes itself. So you may want to update your no-ip with your new ip address if you need to

-Owner Will

item.description:
@brian9612 wrote:

maybe your ip is reseted so put it back to your old ip
